ygData.subject: OOC: Matrix
ygData.msgSnippet: I just wanted everyone to know they finally told the use of the Matrix on Tranformers:Robots in Disguise.  Apparently it can be used to upgrade other bots.

I just wanted everyone to know they finally told the use of the Matrix 
on Tranformers:Robots in Disguise.  Apparently it can be used to 
upgrade other bots.  Also it exists in both Optimus and Ultra somehow 
although Omega wouldn't know this because my story says that Omega 
came from their demision right after they fused the first time. So do 
you approve.  I just wanted to keep everyone informed about the 
Transformers: Robots in Disguise storyline.
